ygData.subject: RE: Re: Usefullness of Jig
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Amen brother.  If I had my way, I would group exclusively with melee ers only.  Not matter what we/I do, grouping with casters is a complete nightmare as
ygData.messageBody:
> If you haven't done it yet, grouping with only melee classes
> is a lot of fun. The above is true - if everyone distributes
> damage well, except for the tough fights you basically have
> zero downtime. Someone goes to pull the next mob while you
> top off every else's health. The only downside is that it's
> very nervewracking (for the bard at least) playing without a
> primary healer. Having a paldin with lay hands helps
> tremendously in easing that fear.

Amen brother. If I had my way, I would group exclusively with melee'ers
only. Not matter what we/I do, grouping with casters is a complete
nightmare as far as downtime goes. SOOO BORING. Hopefully when I make 32nd
level it will help a bit.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]
